sentences.english: After the pit was closed tailings utilization and small fragmentary ore bodies development should be concerned.
sentences.chinese: 礦山閉坑後應繼續勘察開發零星礦體及綜合利用尾礦。

sentences.english: Ore distributed shape was deduced by the apparent resistivity section.
sentences.chinese: 利用視電阻率切片圖來推演礦體展布形態。

sentences.english: This paper described briefly the stoping work of remnant orebody in accumulative manganese deposits.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡介了堆積型錳礦牀殘礦體的回採工作。

sentences.english: Sharp grade cutoffs are the rule at margins of ore bodies.
sentences.chinese: 品位的急劇下降是礦體邊界上的規律。

sentences.english: Dongfengshan gold deposit is occurred in hornstone of Dongfengshan group under iron bearing stratum.
sentences.chinese: 東風山金礦體賦存在含鐵層之下的東風山羣角岩層中。

sentences.english: Because of the small mine, usually the ore was excavated by hand.
sentences.chinese: 由於礦體小，傳統印石採製主要是手工挖掘。

sentences.english: Beneficiation tests were made on various samples of the deep orebody of a lead-zinc mine.
sentences.chinese: 對某鉛鋅礦深部礦體的多種礦樣進行了選礦試驗研究。

sentences.english: Strongly altered mylonite is gold orebody and gold mineralized body.
sentences.chinese: 強蝕變糜棱巖即爲金礦體及金礦化體。

sentences.english: Orebodies in zonal distribution are strictly controlled by crater structure.
sentences.chinese: 礦體嚴格受火山口構造控制。

sentences.english: Ore bodies occur in the middle-upper part of the volcanic pipe.
sentences.chinese: 礦體產於火山管道的中上部。

sentences.english: The ore bodies in the Gongpoquan deposit are mainly hosted within granodiorite porphyry and dacite porphyry.
sentences.chinese: 礦體主要產在花崗閃長斑岩和英安斑岩體內。

sentences.english: The ore deposit of Dazhuangzi Gold Mine is high grade gently dipping medium thick orebody.
sentences.chinese: 大莊子金礦礦體爲高品位緩傾斜中厚礦體。

sentences.english: The ore deposit of Dazhuangzi Gold Mine is high grade gently dipping medium thick orebody.
sentences.chinese: 大莊子金礦礦體爲高品位緩傾斜中厚礦體。

sentences.english: The host rocks of the ore bodies, the Gaixian Formation of Liaohe Group, are a medium grade metamorphosed rock of the Early Proterogoic.
sentences.chinese: 礦體圍巖爲早元古界遼河羣蓋縣組中部變質岩系。

sentences.english: The ore body is in the gold rich part of ore bearing quartz vein.
sentences.chinese: 工業礦體由礦化石英脈的富金段組成。

sentences.english: This helps determine how economic the orebody is.
sentences.chinese: 這有助於確定如何爲經濟礦體。
